projects.name: Quran Portal
projects.desc: A web based Quran app and prayer schedule that uses the public API from [gadingnst](https://github.com/gadingnst/quran-api), equipped with several features such as dark theme, murottal, Indonesian translation, interpretation of surah/verses, and several other features

projects.name: Chomp Restaurant
projects.desc: A web burger restaurant to order burgers, drinks and sides. built using next js and tailwind CSS with React context state management
